title: Swrjijanai dina jwngni thakwi
lyrics:
Swrjijanai dina jwngni thakwi
Gwthar sundayschool dibos jananwi
Nujafwibai dinwi jwngni gejerao
Swrang hwbai jwngni khwmsi gwswkhou -2
(A)
Joy jathwng joy Jisuni
Swrjijanai gaswibw bini
Ha . . . . Ha . . . .
Rongzagwn jwng oraibw
Bifani gwthar no-ao
(B)
Swrgwpurini Arphofra
Naihor honwi bese rongzadwng
Gwjwn . . . Swrgw-ao . . .
Rongzagwn jwng oraibw 
Swrgwni mohor lananwi
